name: Vantage: Primitive Survival Game
description: Vantage is a Primitive Survival Game. Your main objective is simple... to stay alive! You explore the massive world searching for food, creating primitive tools and weapons to create, hunt, and craft other items to make your life easier.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista and later Processor: 4 GHz Intel Dual Core or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB Graphics RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: Any
